Package game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Animates all of our GameObjects using an array of Images converted to frames.
    ConnectTesting
    This Class is for testing purposes only.
    Frame
    Manipulates separate frames that are being animated.
    Game
    The Game class contains methods to communicate with the server; It contains other classes and methods that contain the core-game loop, and will render the level that players will play on.
    GameObject
    It is used as an abstract class, and contains all the methods that all objects within the game will use.
    GameServer
    Used to communicate to all users/clients who are connected to it.
    GameServer.ListClientHandler
    This will listen for information sent from our connected clients and handle that information accordingly.
    GameServer.ListClientHandlerLoc
    This will listen for location information sent from our connected clients and handle that information accordingly.
    Handler
    This is the Class that is used to keep track of all GameObjects within the Game.
    KeyInput
    This Class is how we communicate Player's movements to the Server.
    Login
    This class will launch a chrome window in application mode that will be directed to the login page.
    Player
    This is the class that will handle player game logic and rendering.
    Projectile
    This class extends the GameObject class; It is used to create a GameObject that players can create at will that will fly through the air, in an attempt to damage their opponents.
    Sprite
    This class is where we load and scale all of our images.
    Window
    This Class will construct the window used to display the game.
